definition[0]: if you rationalize behaviour that is wrong, you invent an explanation for it so that it does not seem as bad
example[0]: When he fouls up, Glen always finds a way to rationalize what heâ€™s done.
definition[1]: to make a business more effective by removing unnecessary workers, equipment etc
example[1]: Our systems will be rationalized over the coming months.
definition[2]: to make a business or organization more effective by getting rid of unnecessary staff, equipment etc, or reorganizing its structure
example[2]: The company has been taking steps to rationalize its printing operations.
